question: Which state starts two-day Aadivasi Mahotsav recently?
explanation: The two-day Aadivasi Mahotsav is started in Chhattisgarh capital Raipur. The festival aimed at displaying the rich and diverse tribal traditions of the central state inaugurated by Union Tribal Affairs Minister Jual Oram and Chief Minister Dr Raman Singh. Tribal culture, literature and food festivals, tribal olympiad and hackathon will be held during the event.
